Sentencas: Yttria-stabilized Zirconia (YSZ) is deposited on anode substrates by two untreated and thermally assisted slurry spin coating methods.
Titulo: Fabrication of YSZ electrolyte layers using thermally assisted slurry spin coating method for IT-SOFC application

Sentencas: During the spin coating process, the heating of the substrate increases the affected area and optimally densifies the particles before sintering.
Titulo: Fabrication of YSZ electrolyte layers using thermally assisted slurry spin coating method for IT-SOFC application

Sentencas: We find out that the thermally assisted deposition method can reduce the activation energies of both interfacial and Ohmic resistances with respect to the conventional way.
Titulo: Fabrication of YSZ electrolyte layers using thermally assisted slurry spin coating method for IT-SOFC application

Sentencas: The output power measurements show higher values for the samples prepared by this method.
Titulo: Fabrication of YSZ electrolyte layers using thermally assisted slurry spin coating method for IT-SOFC application

Sentencas: The electrochemical impedance spectroscopy measurements of single cells also show that both resistances reduce.
Titulo: Fabrication of YSZ electrolyte layers using thermally assisted slurry spin coating method for IT-SOFC application

Sentencas: Scanning electron microscopy studies show that the porosity of the YSZ layer coated by the proposed method is lower than that of the untreated layer.
Titulo: Fabrication of YSZ electrolyte layers using thermally assisted slurry spin coating method for IT-SOFC application
